programme.desc: Was it time for James Franklin to go at Penn State? On this episode of Others Receiving Votes, Sports Illustrated's Pat Forde and Bryan Fischer are joined by former longtime College Gameday Reporter Gene Wojciechowski to break down the firing of Penn State Head Coach James Franklin after the teams loss to Northwestern, their third straight. They also breakdown whether Penn State is in position to be a championship contender in the Big Ten and for the College Football National Championship before giving their thoughts on who Penn State should turn to next, bringing up Curt Cignetti of Indiana and the tough choice he could have this offseason. After that, they give out their Midseason Awards for Heisman, Flop, Surprise, Coach and Team of the half season while also talking about some of the dumbest ideas that were brought up by the masses during the first half of the college football season. They finish things off with a view at some of the big games this weekend, giving their picks and some background on each matchup including a few games that could have College Football Playoff implications in USC vs. Notre Dame, BYU vs. Utah and Alabama vs. Tennessee.

programme.title: Preview for "Journey Through the Dolomites"
programme.desc: This is a preview of the 90 minute "Journey through the Dolomites". Experience the spectacular Dolomites mountain range in Italy: dramatic stone spires, vast alpine meadows, charming villages, and brilliant blue lakes. The full film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of "Old Grown Ancient Forests"
programme.desc: This is a preview for the 2 hour full length film "Old Growth" available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Experience the majesty of Californias Ancient Old Growth Redwood forests paired with a soothing soundtrack.

programme.title: California's Wild Coast
programme.desc: Soar with the seabirds over the wild and beautiful north coast of California. The rugged coastline of Mendocino is a vast wilderness full of wildlife, sea caves, bird colonies, and crashing waves that can only be fully appreciated from an aerial view. This 2.5 hour film is an exhilarating flight over this magnificent landscape. Soul stirring ambient music accompanies the spectacular cinematography of "Californias Wild Coast". The full film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Alaska
programme.desc: Experience the magnificence of the Alaskan wilderness in "Journey Through Alaska". Fly over blue glaciers, see grizzly cubs cuddle with their mom, and witness alpenglow on Denali in this new release from NatureStream.tv. The full 90 minute film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv on August 22, 2023.

programme.title: Summer on Mt. Rainier
programme.desc: Experience the beauty of lush wildflower blooms and the rainforests of Mount Rainier paired with a soothing soundtrack in this 50 minute video.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Rise Above Shame
programme.desc: Iyanla Vanzants husband mistreated her for years -- threatening their children and trapping her with fear of greater violence. She shares how she found the strength to leave and escape the cycle.

programme.title: Elizabeth Smart Trapped and Lost
programme.desc: Elizabeth Smart was carried off at 14 years old and was missing for 9 grueling months. Those were the worst months of her life, the details of which were so terrible, she refused to share her story for ten years… until something changed. This is her story of survival and strength.

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay Karma is Served
programme.desc: Blind chef, Christine Ha, shocked the nation when she tried out for the reality show cooking competition, Masterchef. Perhaps even more surprising was Gordon Ramsay’s scandalous reaction. She made him eat his words on national tv and made Masterchef history!

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: The Student Stalker
programme.desc: On June 15th 1980, 8 year old Beth Stauffer called her dad to wish him a happy father’s day, the first clue police got after she went missing 4 weeks earlier. Who stalked and ultimately abducted Mary Stauffer and her young daughter and did they survive?

programme.title: Jonny Kim Launched into Adulthood
programme.desc: Jonny Kim changed careers three times before he even turned 40! Who would believe that this highly decorated Navy SEAL, doctor, and NASA astronaut would be hiding a tragic secret about his past? In the end, what his colleagues have to say about him will bring you to tears.

programme.title: Katie Piper Unbreakable Beauty
programme.desc: Pursuing the model lifestyle in London, Katie was used to gaining attention for her looks. But when her stalker Danny Lynch hired a hitman to attack Katie, her face was destroyed and she became completely unrecognizable. It should’ve been the end of her career dreams, but Katie’s revenge turned into an inspiring rise to fame. Now, THIS is how you make a comeback!﻿

programme.title: Simone Biles Surviving To Soar
programme.desc: Ultimate gymnastics champion Simone Biles was at the top of her sport and defying gravity at the Tokyo 2021 Olympics. Everyone expected her to win, but every athlete has a breaking point… The Team USA superstar finally opens up about her mental health, the strict pressures of the sports industry and the DISTURBING secret involving Dr. Larry Nassar that she hid for years. Find out what REALLY happened to Simone Biles.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: The Power of Words
programme.desc: Busy dad gets wake up call from business associates Mohammed Qahtani and Ian Humphrey sharing true stories about fatherhood and how promises are meant to be kept.

programme.title: Win Against all Odds
programme.desc: Homesick, bankrupt, and father-less, young Dan Lok was devastated when he arrived home one day to find his mom in tears. His riveting coming-of-age story will inspire you to put your best foot forward every single day.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.title: BREAKING BLACKROCK TO LAUNCH CRYPTO PROJECT?!

programme.title: Welcome to AI for Everyone: No Tech Skills Needed

programme.title: Why I Stopped Googling: How AI Replaces Search Engines
programme.desc: We’ve all been there: You Google something simple… and end up lost in a maze of ads, popups, sponsored content, and outdated blog posts. What should have taken 30 seconds turns into a 10-minute scavenger hunt. In this episode, I share why I’ve all but stopped using search engines — and how artificial intelligence, specifically tools like ChatGPT, have become my go-to for finding fast, accurate, and personalized answers. This isn’t just a tech upgrade. It’s a shift in how we interact with information. No links. No scrolling. Just useful answers, tailored to you.

programme.title: Spotlight - Eden Energy
programme.desc:
Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future.
EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water
Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.title: Let's Play a Game
programme.desc: Whether indoors or out, games are fun! Bowl at home with family and friends with a colorful bowling set Katie makes from recycled water bottles. Franz shows how to create your own game board using a variety of art mediums. Jenny and Katie make an indoor hopscotch court that rolls-up, for easy storage. Braid a ring toss toy then use the Family Craft box to make a treasure hunt jar for quiet fun.

programme.title: Metal Forms
programme.desc: Metal comes in so many shapes and forms. Explore two very different types on this episode. First, Leslie Rogalski creates a centerline bracelet, the actual bracelet is pre-shaped chevron metal with holes and and an opening to string seed beads. Then, Tammy Honaman has another metal clay lesson.

programme.title: Beadwork
programme.desc: Cindy Holsclaw takes traditional beadwork in a whole new direction using half-Tila beads to make a bezel setting for a crystal Rivoli. She creates beautiful earrings, a bracelet and more with a circular peyote beadweaving stitch using two-hole beads. In Katie's Beading Lesson, learn to make a wire-wrapped leather cuff.

programme.title: Episode 1: Cards
programme.desc: Make your own special occasion with a unique card. First, Jenn Mason creates a photo card. Next, May Flaum uses a stamped image for her card design. Host Julie Fei-Fan Balzer interviews Kazan Clark. Then, Julie shows how to create a card background using photo corners. Last, Julie creates a card with a house shaped cut out.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Black Bart
programme.desc: Black Bart is responsible for a string of stagecoach robberies but he has proven elusive to detectives Matt and Frankie. Bob arrives from the city to help but youngster Todd provides the key to the case. Original Air Date: 5/13/54.

programme.title: Wild Bunch of Wyoming
programme.desc: Butch Cassidy is seen as a jovial type against killing, as leader of the notorious Wild Bunch. Matt and Frankie go after the outlaws when bank notes appear with phony signatures, trailing Butch all the way to South America. Original Air Date: 6/3/54.

programme.title: International Fellowship of Christians and Jews
programme.desc: The International Fellowship of Christians and Jews supports Holocaust Survivors and those in need in the former Soviet Union and the State of Israel.

programme.title: Renegade's Return
programme.desc: During an election between an honest lawyer and a crooked politician, the crook tries to have his opponent killed. That fails. The crook hires a gunfighter, but is surprised when he works to get the crook out of the race. First Broadcast: 8/19/1956.

programme.title: Sugarfoot Sue
programme.desc: Sugarfoot Sue Ryan tells so many tall tales that her friends no longer believe anything she says. When her father spots the outlaw gang who stole his horses, Sue rides to the rescue, but Lofty does not believe her story. First Broadcast: 8/26/1956.

programme.title: Signal Relief Patch
programme.desc: A reusable, drug-free, and wire-free pain relief device that uses a patented technology of microscopic particles to act as an antenna, diverting pain signals from the body to reduce their impact before they reach the brain.

programme.title: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: Granny wants to go home because folks is so unfriendly. Jed convinces her to call and people give them gifts when they show up on Halloween in their hillbilly clothes. Jed works on getting Pearl to come visit. Original Air Date: Oct. 31, 1962.

programme.title: The Dead Don't Steal
programme.desc: Married Ken Johnson runs a charter plane service with his lover and air stewardess Lilian, who indulges in a little smuggling on his behalf. Then disaster strikes for him, as his wife discovers the affair and Lilian says she is leaving him for another man and the smuggling will end. In a rage he kills her and disposes of the body. But to his astonishment she appears to come back from the dead and ensures that justice catches up with him.

programme.title: IN DA CUT
programme.desc: In Da Cut is a comically inspiring story of what comes after the legal age of adulthood and before the transition of taking on the full responsibilities of being a functioning member of society. The main character Michael is a young aspiring film maker, fresh out of school, who with his like-minded friends feel ready to take on the world. He wants to pursue the life he and his friend have always imagined, by chasing the illusion of beautiful women, big cash and quick recognition in the film circuit. On the path of fulfilling his life long dreams he comes to the shocking revelation that nothing in Hollywood is personal; its just show business

programme.title: SKIN BUSINESS
programme.desc: THE SKIN BUSINESS is a movie about how the Internet has cut into the profits of what was once thought to be a recession-proof business, and how directors and producers are gambling on a newly- popular genre of porn: the porn parody. This film shows how the industry takes on some of entertainments most popular franchises and makes them xxx; from Batman, to the Addams Family, to the Brady Bunch and even animated features like American Dad, there is nothing in mainstream that cant be made fun of in porn. If you love porn, you will love this movie. If you are a virgin to the world of porn, consider this Porn 101.

programme.title: BELL RUNG
programme.desc: A compelling documentary on the effect of concussions on football players and their families. From sleeplessness to suicide, it reveals a complex portrait of life after the gridiron.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 10
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: NeverGiveUp
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Colonel Nutbuster & the Candy Cane Ballerinas
programme.desc: It is indeed a silent night at the library on this Christmas Eve. The Creepy Candy are relaxing in the branches of the Christmas tree watching the snow fall outside as they wonder about the magic of Santa Clause.I am Colonel Harvey Nutbuster. My very own grandfather served with Santa during the Toy Wars. Like brothers they were! I know all about Santa!Harvey Nutbuster unlocks a book that is standing on the mantel and he clips the key to his belt and pushes the book open. The Candies strain to see inside.

programme.title: Gummys Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: CAKE PE CHAI
programme.desc: Its Poodles birthday today and Sundar has planned to prepare the perfect cake for poodle Aaloo Paratha Cake with Chai Frosting but he has to do this while he is also taking care of the Hotel Californias demanding customers. And Chai Raja should not find this out. Ingredients are in place, Sundar is ready to bake and Basha is also ready with a surprise for sundar which is making sure that the cake is never baked. Will the cake be baked?

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: ATHITHI DEVO BHAVA
programme.desc: Chai Raja has taught Sundar a valuable lesson that customers are like god. Cashing on this opportunity Basha walks into the hotel pretending to be a customer. Basha comes into the shop in all kind of disguises dressed like a pot-bellied Carnatic singer soon caught by Sundar, as a suited up officer soon caught by Sundar and at last as a sadhu making Sundar do all sorts of silly and insane chores/services. At last when the customer asks Sundar to massage his limbs, Sundar finds a peculiar fifth leg (Bashas tail) which makes Sundar lose all control and he goes mad. It is sheer madness in the teashop.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Valeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: ROYAL-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is all a flutter his little tea shop is going to host a very special guest- the namboodhiri (the local cheiftain)and his adamant and pampered daughter to the teashop. Basha turns up and his acrobatics impress the little daughter and she insists that he sit with her.Sundar is appalled as Basha milks this development to the fullest and bosses Sundar around as if indeed he were a royal pet. Sundars attempts to oust Basha end in tea slopping over the prince or fruits splooshing on his daughters hairdo. Chai Raja immediately forbids Sundar from any more mischief. Sundar tries to ignore Basha but Basha makes things worse by setting up Sundar and making Chai Raja even angrier. The worst comes when Chai Raja is to be bestowed an honour by the prince and Basha causes Sundar to crash into the trophy busting it up. Chai Raja loses it and Sundar gets triple chores....but there is a smile on his face. For the daughter turns out to be a stubborn brat who insists that the monkey (Basha) be her pet and Basha is dragged away, fists banging as he is smothered with suffocating kisses by the daughter.

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: LetMeFly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: TRAPPED
programme.desc: Sundar is chucking the peels and rubbish (after a mild run-in with Basha) into a compost pit when he notices a queer little sapling with a lovely bud like flower. When Sundar tickles the bud, the plant twitches as if responding to the touch. Intrigued, Sundar scoops up the sapling to a coconut shell and brings it to the hotel but is quickly divested off it as Chai Raja ushers him to clean up before turning in. Chai Raja sloshes his special night brew and some spills onto the plant. The plant shudders unnoticed by anyone, the brew boosting its growth so quickly...that by morning when Sundar wakes up he shrieks to find a massive venus fly trap in place of the small fragile sapling he had left the night before. Chai Raja though does freak out in the beginning does let Sundar keep the huge plant pet once he sees its adeptness at keeping the tables clean off flies, especially when rewarded with sips of tea! Basha finding the plant extremely quirky pranks it with pepper seeds and thats it. The plant now breathing fire chases after Basha himself. And Sundar is thrilled at first, but then things fly wrong as the plant starts wrecking the hotel. It is literally a war in the hotel and Sundar is at his wits end, so is Chai Raja. But Basha is having a good time, though the plant is impartial even towards Basha. Going into magic space.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: The house of the talking objects
programme.desc: The twins look for Ragoo in a fantasy house where objects are alive and don’t like humans, until the twins take care of a door that won’t open

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Slow down in tempo town
programme.desc: The twins are in a city where everyone lives in a frantic manner. They run fast from here and there, talking so fast that you do not understand anything. They must find a way to re-establish in the city a liveable rhythm

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: One of these days
programme.desc: The twins help a nervous Tortoise -whose only friend is a face drawn on a rock-to find the courage to make friends.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Time stood still
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world in which time is stuck: they have to find the original grandfather clock to which the pendulum belongs and fix it.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: The Princess's Party
programme.desc: Aladdin and Jamillah really want to go to the big party that the Princess is holding in the palace gardens but they dont even have an invitation, let alone anything to wear. Genie is convinced he can sneak them in, so he conjures up some great party threads but warns them that they will only last until sunset and they must be back before then or the clothes will disappear! The party is great fun until Aladdin gets carried away pretending to be visiting royalty and forgets the deadline leaving them exposed to the anger of the Grand Vizier. They try to make a run for it but he catches them and its only Genie swooping in at the last minute that saves them.

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: Ah~ It's so cold
programme.desc: Its winter in the Unknown Forest. Duda wakes up and sees icicles for the first time and thinks they are crystal treasure. On the other side of the forest, Scot is hatching another plan to kidnap Pinkar for himself. This time he needs to dig a long tunnel, so he convinces Duda to make one for him if he loses an ice skating contest. With Dada, Bubble and Caber as judges, Scot and Duda begin their skating routines. To everyones surprise, however, Duda performs exceptionally well on the ice, spurring Scot to go further. Ultimately, Scots reckless behavior literally puts him on thin ice. Dada and the others try in every way to help him... but will they succeed?

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Float Fault
programme.desc: Fred thinks that if Brains’ design is chosen for building the class float in the school parade, she will be more popular. Her design wins, but is too complicated to build, and Fred takes the blame. On parade day, Friday transforms into her design—a working Destroyer that wins “Best Special Effects.’

programme.title: The Fat Worm - Thumbelina
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of THUMBELINA, by Hans Christian Andersen. On this occasion, they have not been called out to solve a case, but rather to be guests at the wedding of CORNELIUS, the prince of the Land of Flowers, who is getting married to THUMBELINA. But not long after arriving in this idyllic place, inhabited by tiny fairies and imps, SANDRA and FO have to set to work as usual, as a bird from the distant frozen climes of Sereland kidnaps THUMBELINA, before the wedding. SANDRA and FO travel to Sereland, discover THUMBELINA’s whereabouts and rescue her from MR. MOLE, a rich, powerful, blind mole, who is still in love with the voice of sweet little

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the "Sneezils flu," all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: The Shape Shifter and the Magic Carpet
programme.desc: Jamillah and Aladdin go to market to buy a carpet so Genie can make it fly. They dont have enough money to buy one so Jamillah is delighted when an old lady offers to give her one, seemingly for free. What she doesnt know is that the old lady is actually the nasty Shape Shifter who can morph into any shape and shes after the lamp. She comes to Aladdins house and takes the lamp as payment for the rug and Aladdin and Jamillah have to use their wits to get it, and Genie back!

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Princess Of The Lake – Swan Lake
programme.desc: THE PRINCESS OF THE LAKE – SWAN LAKE

programme.title: Die Laughing - The Emperor’s New Clothes
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Emperor’s New Clothes”, having been called out by the father of HANS, a 5-year-old boy. HANS has gone missing during the parade in which the EMPEROR wore his new clothes for the first time in public. SANDRA discovers that HANS is, in fact, the little boy who laughs when he sees the EMPEROR in his underwear, thus revealing the obvious truth that no one dared mention: the Emperor has no clothes on. The detective will also discover that Rufus, the Emperor’s bitter, resentful jester, is behind the disappearance of HANS.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: After surviving the Great Depression and World War II, America entered an idyllic age, The Atomic Age, where wholesome values and classic Americana were king. Dads could work in a factory and afford to send his kids to college. Moms could stay at home. And families could afford homes in newly emerging suburbia. Life was home baked chocolate chip cookies. Simple and good. However, 50s America was also a time of heinous crimes. The emerging media of television shined its light on all sorts of cruel and inhuman acts warfare, riots, segregation, and a new awareness psychopathic, serial killers.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: There was a golden age of female serial killers in the U.S. and Europe. Female serial killers that targeted their children, husbands, and other family members. This was a time when women were becoming educated but had very little control over their lives. As a result they had very little recourse or legal remedies if they found themselves in a bad marriage or untenable domestic situation, a solution was to 'free themselves' by poisoning their husbands, or anyone controlling their lives and even killing their children.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.desc: Mr. Bang bets the Skipper ten dollars he can't get the trolley to arrive at the train station on time.

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Betty Boop Is My Palm Read -1932
programme.desc: For customer Betty Boop, psychic reader Prof. Bimbo conjures up an adventure on a haunted tropical island in his crystal ball

programme.title: The Playful Polar Bears-1938
programme.desc: A joyfully contented group of polar bears encounter danger when hunters arrive.

programme.title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet 1953: Season 1;Episode 19; Separate Rooms
programme.desc: David and Ricky finally get their own separate rooms - with hilarious results

programme.title: His Trysting Place- 1914
programme.desc: Charlie's wife sends him to the store for a baby bottle with milk. Elsewhere, Ambrose offers to post a love letter for a woman in his boarding house. The two men meet at a restaurant and each takes the other's coat by mistake. Charlie's wife thinks he has a lover; Ambrose's believes he has an illegitimate child.

programme.title: The General 1926
programme.desc: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines

programme.title: Young Sherlocks-1922
programme.desc: The Mystic J.J.J.'s challenge Ernie's bravery; he spins a tale of saving a rich young girl from kidnappers and of creating a utopia called Freetown.

programme.title: A Christmas Without Snow 1980
programme.desc: In A Christmas Without Snow, Michael Learned stars as a recently divorced woman who moves to San Francisco to rebuild her life. Joining the choir of a struggling church, she finds friendship, strength, and a new sense of purpose under the guidance of the stern but inspiring choirmaster (John Houseman). As the group prepares for a performance of Handel’s Messiah, their shared struggles and triumphs bring them closer together, revealing the true meaning of hope and community during the holiday season. Heartfelt and uplifting, this made-for-TV classic shines with warmth and faith.

programme.title: The Littlest Angel 1969
programme.desc: In The Littlest Angel, the beloved holiday story comes to life in a touching musical special. Jerry Skinner stars as a small boy who enters heaven but struggles to fit in among the angels. Longing for the simple joys of his earthly life, he offers a humble gift that becomes the most treasured of all. With heartfelt songs, tender performances, and a timeless message of love and faith, this family favorite captures the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem 1956
programme.desc: In The Star of Bethlehem, the timeless Nativity story is brought to life in a reverent and beautifully crafted short film. Through vivid visuals and heartfelt narration, the journey of Mary and Joseph, the shepherds in the fields, and the guiding star that led the Wise Men to Bethlehem are retold with warmth and devotion. With its simple yet powerful storytelling, this classic reminds audiences of the wonder, hope, and faith at the heart of Christmas.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: Affairs Of Cappy Ricks
programme.desc: Cappy Ricks, a crusty old sea captain, returns home from a long voyage to discover that his family and his business are in chaos--his daughter is set to marry a nitwit that he can't stand, and his future mother-in-law has taken over everything and is set to merge his business with that of a rival company.

programme.title: A Quiet Place To Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned race-car driver plots to kill her ex-husband at the behest of his new wife, but the plan quickly goes awry.

programme.title: The Battle Of El Alamein
programme.desc: World war two drama about the 1942 North Africa battle at El Alamein between the Allies and the Axis forces

programme.title: Texas Trouble Shooters
programme.desc: The Range Busters are out to stop an inheritance swindle.

programme.title: Terror of the Plains
programme.desc: The man that framed Tom Lansing's father for murder is at a ghost town where no one is allowed in or out. Tom gets in by posing as an escaping outlaw with his sidekick Banty posing as the Sheriff that is chasing him.

programme.title: Without Honors (1932) Colorized
programme.desc: “In Without Honors, cowboy star Richard Arlen rides into a frontier tangled in treachery and deceit. Framed for a crime he didn’t commit, he must fight to clear his name and expose the outlaws behind the scheme. With tense drama, blazing action, and a touch of romance, this early Western delivers a rugged tale of courage and justice won the hard way.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos 1941
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in Robin Hood of the Pecos, a stirring tale set in the turbulent days after the Civil War. When corrupt officials exploit and oppress Texas ranchers, Roy rises as a champion of the people—fighting injustice with his six-guns and his songs. With the help of Gabby Hayes and heroine Marjorie Reynolds, he takes on the villains to bring peace and fairness back to the frontier. Filled with action, music, and Roy’s trademark charm, this Western delivers justice in true outlaw-hero style.

programme.title: A Boy And His Dog
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a boy who can communicate with his dog telepathically is targeted by a mysterious committee

programme.title: The Monster Maker
programme.desc: A mad scientist injects his enemies with an acromegaly virus, causing them to become hideously deformed.

programme.title: esther and the king 1960-1
programme.desc: Two decades before she would gain fame and some fortune as Alexis Carrington on Dynasty (1981), Dame Joan Collins starred as Esther in this melodramatic, routine Biblical story. The setting is Persia in the fourth century B.C., as Esther comes to the attention of the recently widowed King Ahasuerus

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man, hounded by a psychopathic general, learns martial arts at the Shaolin temple to avenge his father's death. To achieve this he forgoes a budding romance with his kungfu master's daughter, a shepherdess.

programme.title: Drunken Tai Chi
programme.desc: A spoiled young man - on the run from a ruthless killer - hooks up with a puppeteer and his wife who are masters of the art of tai chi; the only style that can defeat the killer.

programme.title: The Guy with the Secret Kung Fu
programme.desc: Two Ming patriots spend their days helping the weak and rescuing damsels in distress. This alum gets them in trouble, though, as they are captured and then volunteered to go after the fearsome Dragon Gang, a tribe of bandits that have been terrorizing the land

programme.title: Weapons of Death
programme.desc: A police commissioner tries to bring a gangster to justice as the kingpin's out-of-control crimes set even his own underworld allies against him.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, Sean explores Central Cigars, a cornerstone of St. Petersburg‚Äôs cigar scene, highlighting its rich history, expertly curated cigar selection, and the passionate community it fosters.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean crosses the pond to sit down with Shaun Wilkinson, the driving force behind the British cigar brand, Rebellion. Shaun pulls back the curtain on the unique challenges and triumphs of establishing a premium cigar company in the UK, the inspiration behind Rebellion's distinctive blends, and their vision for the future of British cigars. Tune in for an engaging conversation that explores a fascinating corner of the global cigar landscape.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: This week on Burn Rate, tobacco aficionados Brian and Chris delve into the diverse and often debated world of Gurkha cigars. They'll explore a specific Gurkha offering, dissecting its blend, construction, and flavor profile.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: This episode explores Quality Importers, a comprehensive provider of cigar accessories, showcasing their diverse product lines, in-house customization services, and new "Conspiracy" cigar brand, all built on a foundation of strategic acquisitions and a passion for the cigar lifestyle.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Stephen and I enjoy cigars or pipes, drinks, and share some cigar news. We‚Äôll also feature a Cigar Word from Micallef and a Cigar Tip from Erez cigars. Dave Yancey joins us for a pairing of Lovely Cigars from Green Bay, WI with Michters Small Batch American whiskey. Plus, a Shop Stop at Mi Casa Cigars and Lounge near Tampa, FL.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: On this episode we visit Kurt of Eldorado Fine Cigars in Rockwall Texas. This is the newest of their 2 locations in Texas, the other being in McKinney.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: Premium cigars are a symbol of craftsmanship and luxury, attracting people for various reasons. Whether it's for relaxation, status, camaraderie, or simply the passion behind the smoke, we explore the many reasons why people are drawn to these exquisite products.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: Dave, BG, and guest Tony (from Crux Cigars) smoke and discuss the Crux Guild, a versatile cigar with an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper and Nicaraguan filler/binder, known for its warm baking spice and nutty, cedary notes. Tony also highlights the Crux Limitada, featuring eight tobaccos from five regions and a proprietary 12-year-aged Habano seed Estel√≠ wrapper. They delve into Crux's strategic packaging, including five-packs with tasting notes and QR codes to educate consumers, and discuss the importance of supporting local businesses and the vibrant, familial community within the cigar industry.

programme.title: Guests Daniella Moodie, Krystal Ball
programme.desc: VP Kamala Harris’s ascension to Presidential nominee is an extraordinary historical moment. I talk with Danielle Moodie and Krystal Ball about what this all means and where we’re going.

programme.title: Guest Pamela Maugile
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: July 9, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for July 9, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Raquel Willis
programme.desc: Raquel Willis is a major trans activist and the author of a powerful memoir called The Risk It Takes To Bloom. We dive deep into what it means to be trans from her coming out to her politics to her dating life. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: The Crew has an Honest Conversation about HBCUs
programme.desc: We all love our HBCUs, but truth be told, there are some issues about HBCUs that need to be addressed. In this special edition of City Limits, HBCU grads (Starr, Yonathan and J. Hall) share their personal experiences while attending Howard University and Hampton University, two of the nation's top HBCUs.

programme.title: Guests Tera Chantelle, Nadya Martinez, Stephen Thomas Gillis
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Capricorn celebrities, trending news, comic book heroes, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: From Food to Freedom
programme.desc: 6 people with type 2 diabetes in a house for 10 days, with only delicious food as their medicine.

programme.title: Susan's Vegan Soy Curl Bolognese
programme.desc: Extraordinary, meaty Bolognese with all the rich flavor but no cholesterol

programme.title: The Cow in the Room
programme.desc: Watch this riveting speech by Dr. Sailesh Rao at the November 2021 COP26 Global Climate Summit.

programme.title: The Best Diet for Diabetes
programme.desc: A plant-based diet can help reduce diabetes risk. Discover how simple changes transform your health!

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Sister Rolls and Yoga Cakes
programme.desc: Spork Food's sisters make their Fresh Spring Rolls with Glazed Shiitake Mushrooms and Tangy Peanut Dipping Sauce! Yoga master, Andrew Sealy, cooks delicious Pancakes with a homemade Blueberry Syrup

programme.title: Redfoo's Party Farmhouse- Short film
programme.desc: Enter the California kitchen of LMFAO's Redfoo & his partner Jazzy! Watch them create magical food!

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Trainer Tacos and Weight Loss Wings
programme.desc: Fitness queen Audrey Dunham reveals the secret to idea weight and fitness.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Party Dish: Italian Peppers
programme.desc: Elysabeth Alfano, makes Italian Stuffed Peppers and shares her secret mock-meat recipe! Reality star, Billie Lee, makes Tomato Basil Soup and a Vegan Grilled Cheese Sandwich

programme.title: Village of the Vampire
programme.desc: Rebecca is searching for her sister, a young journalist who went missing while investigating a series of unfortunate events. The trail leads her to Timere, a remote place far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, where amidst the tight lipped silence of the town's inhabitants there's an ever growing fear of dark forces at work and no-one dares to leave their home at night. Here Rebecca meets an extravagant writer, the church warden of the town and above all Caleb, a charming, rich and elegant man whose dark gaze hides a chilling secret. It's in this town, where time appears to move between the shadows and danger lurks around every corner that Rebecca learns of the terrible truth and the battle between good and evil begins...

programme.title: Clown Motel
programme.desc: Clown Motel follows a group of ghost hunters, coming from an old ghost town and a bachelorette party, returning home from Las Vegas. When the groups meet up, by mistake, they're left to discover if the motel is really abandoned and haunted by the souls, of the clowns, that once lived there...

programme.title: Verano Sangriento
programme.desc: Cuatro jóvenes llegan a Mallorca para disfrutar de unas idílicas vacaciones de verano, pero adentrándose en los lugares más inhóspitos de la isla comenzarán un viaje infernal...

programme.title: Juicios de Brujas
programme.desc: Dos realizadores de documentales y un ex policía investigan la desaparición de una niña que se rumorea que fue secuestrada por una bruja en los bosques encantados de Connecticut...

programme.title: Habitación Ouija
programme.desc: Una mujer agorafóbica con autismo comienza a invocar espíritus para que sean sus amigos mientras su hermano/cuidador está ausente durante el día, pero cuanto más tiempo pasa con los espíritus, más claro se vuelve que no son tan amigables después de todo...

programme.title: Alas De La Muerte
programme.desc: Una historia de drama acción donde mostramos lo que los carteles son capases de hacer con tal de conseguir lo que quieren, pero también vemos lo que una mujer es capaz de hacer por amor a su familia. Es una historia basada en hechos reales.

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: El Desertor
programme.desc: Luego de ser reclutado para el servicio militar y ante los abusos de su jefe inmediato, el Subteniente Montilla, Julián escapa del cuartel, lo que provoca una feroz persecución por parte de Montilla, quien se ha enamorado de Sagrario y hará todo lo posible para separar a los jóvenes.

programme.title: El Tercer Deseo
programme.desc: Eugenio, un corredor de bienes raíces despierta en una esquina de la ciudad con una descomunal borrachera y descubre cerca una desportillada tetera de metal. La toma y manosea a ver si es de plata y, de pronto, se le aparece el espectro de un duende que le sugiere formule tres deseos. El genio desaparece sin dar oportunidad al tercer deseo. Mas tarde, descubre que los deseos le han sido concedidos pero de forma equivocada. La vida de Eugenio se complica, solo anhela reencontrar la tetera abandonada y pedir el tercer deseo.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: Hold Your Peace
programme.desc: Peace isn’t passive, it’s practiced. Trouble is real, but God has given you everything you need to hold onto peace when life feels overwhelming.

programme.title: God Will Work It In!
programme.desc: Sometimes, even when your situation isn’t getting better, you are. Stop stressing like you need to do it alone and remember that God is with you in it. He’s already given you what you need — and He’ll help you work it in to what you’re facing.

programme.title: Deeper Than You Think

programme.title: Forward Not Finished

programme.title: Focus Your Faith
